about_the_game:
The Cube is a cooperative FPS where you and up to three friends are trapped in a high-stakes virtual heist. Tasked by an unseen patron, your mission is to infiltrate the office complex of Mr. Z, gather critical data, and escape before time runs out.

Each level is procedurally generated, with randomized floor layouts and security setups, creating fresh challenges every playthrough. The game features two unique timers: a shared mission timer and individual survival timers. As you progress, your choices and reputation with the patron influence the time you have to complete each mission. Failure is real—fall behind, and you’re left to face the consequences alone.

Key Features

  • Procedurally Generated Floors: Navigate a unique layout on every playthrough.

  • Dual Timer System: Balance mission time with individual survival time.

  • Dynamic Heist Mechanics: Hack terminals, bypass security, and grab essential items.

  • Real-Time Voice Communication: Coordinate strategy with your team.

  • Reputation System: Earn or lose time based on your performance and patron’s favor.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit/32 bit) or Newer
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit/32 bit) or Newer
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual core or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: The game is an online multiplayer cooperative FPS Rougelike set in a world where the players are only allowed to exist there as long as their time allows it. Time is used as currency and is obtained via completing missions, tasks, and goals.
